text: Juliano André Pereira da Silva (born 13 October 1986 in Parapuã, São Paulo), commonly known as Juliano, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a defender for Grêmio Novorizontino.Soccerway profileFootballzz profileZagueiros Marcio Garcia e Juliano reforçam o JU ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Albania Category:Expatriate footballers in Albania Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Clube Atlético Tricordiano players Category:Clube Atlético Sorocaba players Category:União Agrícola Barbarense Futebol Clube players Category:Esporte Clube Juventude players Category:Avaí FC players Category:Joinville Esporte Clube players Category:Foz do Iguaçu Futebol Clube players Category:FK Kukësi players Category:Associação Desportiva Cabofriense players Category:Clube Atlético Bragantino players
